Package utility

Class CustomerQuery

java.lang.Object
utility.CustomerQuery
public abstract class CustomerQuery extends Object
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding Customer records.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers() throws SQLException
      This function uses a SELECT query to the database to get all the customers located in the database. Each record returned from the query is used to create a new Customer object which is then added to an ObservableList. This List is returned by the function.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList of all Customer objects created from the database
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insert

      public static int insert(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, Integer divisionId) throws SQLException
      This function uses an INSERT query to add a new customer record to the database. Each parameter corresponds to a piece of customer information in the database.
      Parameters:
      lastUpdate - the date and time this customer is being added and therefore updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user who created therefore last updated this customer
      createDate - the date and time this customer is being created
      createdBy - the user who created this customer
      divisionId - the ID number for the division the customer lives in
      customerName - the name of the customer
      postalCode - the postal code of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      Returns:
      the number of rows returned by the execution of the INSERT query, validating that the insert was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • update

      public static int update(int customerId, String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId) throws SQLException
      This function updates a customer record in the database using an UPDATE query and information from the parameters.
      Parameters:
      address - the updated address of the customer
      postalCode - the updated postal code of the customer
      customerName - the updated name of the customer
      divisionId - the updated division ID the customer lives in
      lastUpdatedBy - the date and time of the update
      lastUpdate - the user making the update
      customerId - the ID of the customer being updated
      phoneNumber - the updated phone number of the customer
      Returns:
      the number of rows returned by the execution of the DELETE query, validating that the delete was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • delete

      public static int delete(int customerId) throws SQLException
      This method executes a DELETE query on the database using the provided Customer ID to delete said customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID number of the customer to be deleted
      Returns:
      the number of rows returned by the execution of the DELETE query, validating that the delete was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException
